sentences.english: HPLC method was used to determine aurantiamarin in orange peel.
sentences.chinese: 用HPLC法測定陳皮中橙皮苷的含量。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a HPLC method for determination of hesperidin in Weixuekang tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立維血康片中橙皮苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The flavonoids content in pulp was very low, and relatively stable.
sentences.chinese: 果皮中類黃酮主要是橙皮苷，且呈現下降趨勢。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a simple sensitive HPLC method for determining hesperidin in Fuke baibai tables.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立婦科白帶片中橙皮苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To isolate and purify high-purity neohesperidin from Fructus Aurantii extract.
sentences.chinese: 目的從枳殼提取物中分離純化高純度新橙皮苷。

sentences.english: Identification and quantitative determination of diosgenin of Jingangteng effervescent tablet;
sentences.chinese: 目的建立金果泡騰片中橙皮苷含量的測定方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish an HPLC method for determination of hesperidin in Jinguoyin.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立高效液相色譜法測定金果飲中橙皮苷的含量。

sentences.english: A new method was studied on extracting hesperidin from orange peel.
sentences.chinese: 研究了從桔皮中提取橙皮苷的一種新方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To establish an HPLC method to determine hesperidin contents in Chensuxiang tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立陳蘇香片中橙皮苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: HPLC method for determination of hesperidin in Shedan Chenpi capsules was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了測定蛇膽陳皮膠囊中橙皮苷的HPLC法。
對橙皮苷進行了結構修飾。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for controlling aurantiamarin content of orange peel tincture in Mistura Pepsini.
sentences.chinese: 目的對胃蛋白酶合劑中橙皮酊進行含量控制。

sentences.english: Finely grate about a teaspoon of orange zest and put aside.
sentences.chinese: 將橙皮擦出大約一茶匙的細末待用。

sentences.english: The peel and membranous parts of these fruits have the highest hesperidin concentrations.
sentences.chinese: 這些水果的果皮和膜部分有橙皮苷的濃度最高。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To determine hesperidin in Shengren Qiangti capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定參仁強體膠囊中橙皮苷的含量。

sentences.english: Hesperidin is abundant in dried tangerine peel (DTP), which can function as an antioxidant.
sentences.chinese: 陳皮富含豐富的橙皮苷，是一種抗氧化劑。

definition: orange peel/tangerine peel/dried orange peel used in Chinese medicine
